name: Armos Knight
description: A statue enemy that comes to life under certain conditions.

fields.name: Rail ID
fields.description: Defines the movement rail ID for the Armos Knight.

fields.name: Behavior
fields.description: Determines how the Armos Knight behaves.

0.name: Fixed
0.description: The Armos Knight stays in place.

1.name: Pushable
1.description: The Armos Knight can be pushed by the player.

2.name: Large, Attacks from Behind
2.description: A large Armos Knight that only attacks when approached from behind.

3.name: Large, Pushable
3.description: A large Armos Knight that can be pushed.

4.name: Large, Activated
4.description: A large Armos Knight that is activated upon interaction.

5.name: Default
5.description: The standard behavior for Armos Knights.

6.name: Large, Fixed
6.description: A large Armos Knight that remains stationary.
